name: Oxivant 500 mg / 100 mg tablets
description: Supplements contain several vitamins and minerals. It is indicated for promoting growth in children, stronger muscles and bone tissues, weight gain, fatigue of any nature, anorexia and malnutrition, general weakness, decreased alertness, and convalescence. Multivitamins and minerals are used to supplement nutrients that are not obtained from food. Multivitamins and minerals alsoÂ treat vitamin and mineral imbalances caused by disease, pregnancy, poor diet, digestive problems, certain medicines, and a number of other conditions.
